verses.verse: וַֽיְהִ֥י <WH1961> used כָל־ <WH3605> now the whole הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> And the whole earth שָׂפָ֣ה <WH8193> language אֶחָ֑ת <WH259> was of one וּדְבָרִ֖ים <WH1697> speech אֲחָדִֽים׃ <WH259> and of one

וַֽיְהִ֖י <WH1961> came בְּנָסְעָ֣ם <WH5265> And it came to pass as they journeyed מִקֶּ֑דֶם <WH6924> from the east וַֽיִּמְצְא֥וּ <WH4672> that they found בִקְעָ֛ה <WH1237> a plain בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land שִׁנְעָ֖ר <WH8152> of Shinar וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> and they dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> And they said אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> one אֶל־ <WH413> about רֵעֵ֗הוּ <WH7453> to another הָ֚בָה <WH3051> Go to נִלְבְּנָ֣ה <WH3835> let us make לְבֵנִ֔ים <WH3843> brick וְנִשְׂרְפָ֖ה <WH8313> and burn לִשְׂרֵפָ֑ה <WH8316> them throughly וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> had לָהֶ֤ם הַלְּבֵנָה֙ <WH3843> And they had brick לְאָ֔בֶן <WH68> for stone וְהַ֣חֵמָ֔ר <WH2564> and slime הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> used לָהֶ֖ם לַחֹֽמֶר׃ <WH2563> they for morter

וַיֹּאמְר֞וּ <WH559> And they said הָ֣בָה ׀ <WH3051> Go to נִבְנֶה־ <WH1129> let us build לָּ֣נוּ עִ֗יר <WH5892> us a city וּמִגְדָּל֙ <WH4026> and a tower וְרֹאשׁ֣וֹ <WH7218> whose top בַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> [may reach] unto heaven וְנַֽעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> and let us make לָּ֖נוּ שֵׁ֑ם <WH8034> us a name פֶּן־ <WH6435> otherwise נָפ֖וּץ <WH6327> lest we be scattered abroad עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> upon the face כָל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the whole earth

וַיֵּ֣רֶד <WH3381> came down יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> And the LORD לִרְאֹ֥ת <WH7200> to see אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּגְדָּ֑ל <WH4026> and the tower אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בָּנ֖וּ <WH1129> builded בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> which the children הָאָדָֽם׃ <WH120> of men

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> And the LORD הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold עַ֤ם <WH5971> Behold the people אֶחָד֙ <WH259> [is] one וְשָׂפָ֤ה <WH8193> language אַחַת֙ <WH259> and they have all one לְכֻלָּ֔ם <WH3605> all וְזֶ֖ה <WH2088> and this הַחִלָּ֣ם <WH2490> and this they begin לַעֲשׂ֑וֹת <WH6213> to do וְעַתָּה֙ <WH6258> and now לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִבָּצֵ֣ר <WH1219> will be restrained מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> and they כֹּ֛ל <WH3605> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which יָזְמ֖וּ <WH2161> from them which they have imagined לַֽעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> to do

הָ֚בָה <WH3051> Go to נֵֽרְדָ֔ה <WH3381> let us go down וְנָבְלָ֥ה <WH1101> and there confound שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there שְׂפָתָ֑ם <WH8193> their language אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> that לֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <WH8085> they may not understand אִ֖ישׁ <WH582> another שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> speech רֵעֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7453> another's

וַיָּ֨פֶץ <WH6327> scattered them abroad יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> So the LORD אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> מִשָּׁ֖ם <WH8033> from thence עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> upon the face כָל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth וַֽיַּחְדְּל֖וּ <WH2308> and they left off לִבְנֹ֥ת <WH1129> to build הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> the city

עַל־ <WH5921> over כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that קָרָ֤א <WH7121> called שְׁמָהּ֙ <WH8034> Therefore is the name of it בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> Babel כִּי־ <WH3588> because שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> there בָּלַ֥ל <WH1101> did there confound יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> because the LORD שְׂפַ֣ת <WH8193> the language כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of all the earth וּמִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> there הֱפִיצָ֣ם <WH6327> scatter them abroad יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> over פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> upon the face כָּל־ <WH3605> of the whole הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of all the earth פ

אֵ֚לֶּה <WH428> These תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <WH8435> These [are] the generations שֵׁ֔ם <WH8035> of Shem שֵׁ֚ם <WH8035> Shem בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מְאַ֣ת <WH3967> [was] an hundred שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְפַּכְשָׁ֑ד <WH775> Arphaxad שְׁנָתַ֖יִם <WH8141> two years אַחַ֥ר <WH310> after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <WH3999> the flood

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived שֵׁ֗ם <WH8035> And Shem אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> אַרְפַּכְשָׁ֔ד <WH775> Arphaxad חֲמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס

וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֣ד <WH775> And Arphaxad חַ֔י <WH2421> lived חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> five וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> שָֽׁלַח׃ <WH7974> Salah

וַֽיְחִ֣י <WH2421> lived אַרְפַּכְשַׁ֗ד <WH775> And Arphaxad אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> שֶׁ֔לַח <WH7974> Salah שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> and three שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס
וְשֶׁ֥לַח <WH7974> And Salah חַ֖י <WH2421> lived שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֵֽבֶר׃ <WH5677> Eber

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived שֶׁ֗לַח <WH7974> And Salah אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֵ֔בֶר <WH5677> Eber שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <WH7969> and three שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס
וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived עֵ֕בֶר <WH5677> And Eber אַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> four וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> פָּֽלֶג׃ <WH6389> Peleg

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived עֵ֗בֶר <WH5677> And Eber אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> פֶּ֔לֶג <WH6389> Peleg שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> and thirty שָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> years וְאַרְבַּ֥ע <WH702> four מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס
וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived פֶ֖לֶג <WH6389> And Peleg שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> רְעֽוּ׃ <WH7466> Reu

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived פֶ֗לֶג <WH6389> And Peleg אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> רְע֔וּ <WH7466> Reu תֵּ֥שַׁע <WH8672> and nine שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years וּמָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס
וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> lived רְע֔וּ <WH7466> And Reu שְׁתַּ֥יִם <WH8147> two וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֖ים <WH7970> and thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂרֽוּג׃ <WH8286> Serug

וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> lived רְע֗וּ <WH7466> And Reu אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> שְׂר֔וּג <WH8286> Serug שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> and seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years וּמָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס
וַיְחִ֥י <WH2421> lived שְׂר֖וּג <WH8286> And Serug שְׁלֹשִׁ֣ים <WH7970> thirty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> נָחֽוֹר׃ <WH5152> Nahor

וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> lived שְׂר֗וּג <WH8286> And Serug אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֥וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> נָח֖וֹר <WH5152> Nahor מָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> two hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס
וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> lived נָח֔וֹר <WH5152> And Nahor תֵּ֥שַׁע <WH8672> nine וְעֶשְׂרִ֖ים <WH6242> and twenty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֖וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> תָּֽרַח׃ <WH8646> Terah

וַיְחִ֣י <WH2421> lived נָח֗וֹר <WH5152> And Nahor אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> after הוֹלִיד֣וֹ <WH3205> he begat אֶת־ <WH853> תֶּ֔רַח <WH8646> Terah תְּשַֽׁע־ <WH8672> nine עֶשְׂרֵ֥ה <WH6240> teen שָׁנָ֖ה <WH8141> years וּמְאַ֣ת <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> and begat בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> sons וּבָנֽוֹת׃ <WH1323> and daughters ס

וַֽיְחִי־ <WH2421> lived תֶ֖רַח <WH8646> And Terah שִׁבְעִ֣ים <WH7657> seventy שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיּ֙וֹלֶד֙ <WH3205> and begat אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> Abram אֶת־ <WH853> נָח֖וֹר <WH5152> Nahor וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרָֽן׃ <WH2039> and Haran

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <WH8435> Now these [are] the generations תֶּ֔רַח <WH8646> of Terah תֶּ֚רַח <WH8646> Terah הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָ֔ם <WH87> Abram אֶת־ <WH853> נָח֖וֹר <WH5152> Nahor וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָרָ֑ן <WH2039> and Haran וְהָרָ֖ן <WH2039> and Haran הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> לֽוֹט׃ <WH3876> Lot

וַיָּ֣מָת <WH4191> died הָרָ֔ן <WH2039> And Haran עַל־ <WH5921> in פְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> before תֶּ֣רַח <WH8646> Terah אָבִ֑יו <WH1> his father בְּאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in the land מוֹלַדְתּ֖וֹ <WH4138> of his nativity בְּא֥וּר <WH218> in Ur כַּשְׂדִּֽים׃ <WH3778> of the Chaldees

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took אַבְרָ֧ם <WH87> And Abram וְנָח֛וֹר <WH5152> and Nahor לָהֶ֖ם נָשִׁ֑ים <WH802> them wives שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> the name אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife אַבְרָם֙ <WH87> of Abram's שָׂרָ֔י <WH8297> [was] Sarai וְשֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> and the name אֵֽשֶׁת־ <WH802> wife נָחוֹר֙ <WH5152> of Nahor's מִלְכָּ֔ה <WH4435> Milcah בַּת־ <WH1323> the daughter הָרָ֥ן <WH2039> of Haran אֲבִֽי־ <WH1> the father מִלְכָּ֖ה <WH4435> of Milcah וַֽאֲבִ֥י <WH1> and the father יִסְכָּֽה׃ <WH3252> of Iscah
וַתְּהִ֥י <WH1961> become שָׂרַ֖י <WH8297> But Sarai עֲקָרָ֑ה <WH6135> was barren אֵ֥ין <WH369> had לָ֖הּ וָלָֽד׃ <WH2056> she [had] no child

וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> took תֶּ֜רַח <WH8646> And Terah אֶת־ <WH853> אַבְרָ֣ם <WH87> Abram בְּנ֗וֹ <WH1121> his son וְאֶת־ <WH853> ל֤וֹט <WH3876> and Lot בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son הָרָן֙ <WH2039> of Haran בֶּן־ <WH1121> his son's בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> son וְאֵת֙ <WH853> שָׂרַ֣י <WH8297> and Sarai כַּלָּת֔וֹ <WH3618> his daughter in law אֵ֖שֶׁת <WH802> wife אַבְרָ֣ם <WH87> Abram's בְּנ֑וֹ <WH1121> his son וַיֵּצְא֨וּ <WH3318> and they went forth אִתָּ֜ם <WH854> together מֵא֣וּר <WH218> with them from Ur כַּשְׂדִּ֗ים <WH3778> of the Chaldees לָלֶ֙כֶת֙ <WH1980> to enter אַ֣רְצָה <WH776> into the land כְּנַ֔עַן <WH3667> of Canaan וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and they came עַד־ <WH5704> far חָרָ֖ן <WH2771> unto Haran וַיֵּ֥שְׁבוּ <WH3427> and dwelt שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there

וַיִּהְי֣וּ <WH1961> become יְמֵי־ <WH3117> And the days תֶ֔רַח <WH8646> of Terah חָמֵ֥שׁ <WH2568> and five שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years וּמָאתַ֣יִם <WH3967> hundred שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> died תֶּ֖רַח <WH8646> and Terah בְּחָרָֽן׃ <WH2771> in Haran ס
